title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Developing Customized Strategies for Flexible Workplace Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and workplace learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their cognitive styles and learning preferences to establish personalized learning strategies.
Learners achieve over 80% participation in collaborative learning activities for scientific problem-solving in flexible workplace learning environments.
Learners can design and present integrated approaches to utilizing digital/analog learning materials in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
